column4: I have a problem with using Mozilla on Ubuntu 8.10 for some weird reason
I have friends on yahoo groups and I can't see their pictures anymore
try disabling add-ons as a first step
it used to work about an hour or so ago, but I got some message on the toolbar and it asked me to UNDO something but I decided to just close that and now I can't see their pics
Ok I disabled what little add ons I had
did you try disabling the addons? or you can also try a <Ctrl>+F5 (refresh, clear cache) otherwise it might be more complicated
Ok I removed the add-ons now what do I do?
I cannot see under image 5 but what do I do with that code?
what do I do with the code I am given?
actually the code is supposed to show some java image... it's not showing on my pc either :P
I wend under EDIT > Content > and I took off things that were blocked
